channel.title: I need some help with some npc stuff
channel.description:
Problem:ok well i need some 1 to help me put in all of the attackable npcs from real rs. I also need some one to tell me how to make it so that when some one logs in it tells everyone on the server such as serchman has logged in there are now 10 payers online or whatever.
Serverbase:TestScape
Difficulty:I think like 5.
i hav to go for now but!!! i will be on tomorrow! i shall see your replies tomorro.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 13, 2006, 11:28:51 PM[/size][hr]anyone??? please i really need help
